newsitem.title: SWEDEN: MERRILL SEES NOKIA '97 EPS AT FIM 16.70.
newsitem.headline: MERRILL SEES NOKIA '97 EPS AT FIM 16.70.

text.p: U.S. investment bank Merrill Lynch has raised its forecast for Finnish telecoms group Nokia Oy's full-year 1997 EPS to 16.70 markka from an earlier 15.50 markka forecast, sources who had read a new Merrill Lynch report told Reuters on Wednesday.
Merrill Lynch also raised its full-year 1998 EPS forecast for Nokia to 20.70 markka from 18 markka. The bank saw average annual growth of 23 percent for Nokia over the coming five years.
